title: Chapter 4287 - Chapter 4287: 4286 Other Fragments Of The Starfield!
body:
Chapter 4287 - Chapter 4287: 4286 Other Fragments Of The Starfield!

Chapter 4287: 4286 other fragments of the Starfield!

Translator: 549690339

Wang Xian continued to fly towards the depths of the riot zone.

The surrounding scenery flashed past quickly.

He looked at the route on the treasure map and changed his direction. He continued to fly in one direction!

After flying for two years, Wang Xian arrived at the central area of the riot zone.

When he was close to this area, he could feel the terrifying energy coming from the front.

The area in front of him was the origin of the riot zone.

All the light came from here!

In front of him, there were special meteorites floating in the air.

These meteorites carried a special and terrifying energy.

From time to time, he could see some meteorites attacking each other.

The energy released by the meteorites attacking each other was extremely terrifying!

Every attack was at the level of a heaven’s origin creator.

And the attacks of these meteorites seemed to come from instinct.

It was as if they had met two elemental gods with different attributes and engaged in an instinctive battle!

Wang Xian looked at the position in front of him and then looked at the treasure map in his hand. He directly crushed the treasure map with a powerful force!

The situation recorded in the treasure map had changed.

According to the treasure map, there was a huge meteorite at this location.

This meteorite exuded a strong vitality. If he could obtain it, he would be able to achieve an incredible improvement.

However, the meteorite at this location had disappeared!

In other words, this treasure map was useless!

He destroyed it immediately!

“It’s hard to tell if the treasure map is real or fake. I shouldn’t be disturbed by the information on it!”

Wang Xian thought to himself as he scanned his surroundings.

According to the information he obtained from the Heaven’s origin communication device, the meteorites in the center were called Chaos Stones.

Chaos stones contained all kinds of energy.

However, these energies were all condensed together. They couldn’t be refined or used!

They would be like the elemental gods, carrying out unintentional attacks.

If one were to go deep inside and suffer the chaos of these chaos gems, then everything in the surroundings would be disturbed.

Some of the escaping treasures could not be used.

If one could not withstand the energy fluctuations of the chaos gems’attacks, then they would fall inside.

Such chaos gem riots often happened inside.

Therefore, every heavenly fate expert who entered would be extremely cautious!

However, there were many fragments of the Elemental God in the center.

These fragments were also rare treasures for heavenly fate experts.

As for those in the ruler realm, they were even more so!

Other than the elemental fragments, there were also special polished treasures.

The chaos gem contained all kinds of energy. Some of the energy in the Chaos Gem was polished into a special form and had individual attributes. It could be used as a weapon.

Some of the weapons were as powerful as a beginner in the Heaven’s origin realm.

Although they were not as powerful as the ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin realm, they were still comparable to the five elements millstone.

Therefore, there were still many powerhouses who could not help but enter and take risks.

However, there were also many strong people who died in there!

Wang Xian did not enter directly.

He had to enter such a dangerous place after he had a clear understanding of it.

His body moved and Wang Xian began to observe the area around him.

While he was observing, he could occasionally see some strong people in the Heaven’s origin realm who were also observing the area.

Wang Xian did not get close to them. Both parties maintained a safe distance!

“HMM?”

At the same time, while Wang Xian was observing the area at the center of the riot zone.

It was located at a location not far away.

There were many tall towers here. The tall towers were engraved with magic patterns.

The entire magic pattern was emitting a luster.

At the top of the tall towers, there were many resplendent fragments of the elemental god.

Each fragment seemed to be worth a lot!

One could see with the naked eye that waves of energy were entering the elemental god from the center of the riot.

The energy guided by the Elemental God entered the lower part of the tower.

At the lower part of the tower, there was a pillar!

Within each pillar, there were dozens of ruler realm disciples cultivating!

And in the middle of the eight towers, there was a small palace!

In the palace, there were four powerhouses in the Tianyuan blessed realm sitting cross-legged inside.

Suddenly, a bright lamp beside a Tianyuan blessed realm powerhouse suddenly emitted a luster!

The light of the bright lamp suddenly began to change and finally, it formed a figure.

And this figure was exactly the same as Wang Xian who was not far away!

This sudden change stunned the tianyuan manifestation powerhouse beside him for a moment. Then, he stood up immediately!

His eyes were filled with excitement.

“Patriarch, what’s the situation?”

The other three Tianyuan manifestation powerhouses looked over in astonishment when they saw his sudden change.

“The divination lamp has lit up. An expert with a fragment of the Starfield has appeared in the surroundings!”

The Heavenly Yuan creation expert said excitedly!

“Is that so? It’s such a coincidence that a starfield fragment has appeared in the surroundings. Sect ancestor, this is your treasure. We must obtain it!”

The other three heavenly yuan creation experts were filled with joy.

The Heavenly Yuan Creation Treasure Starfield was a treasure that was born in their universe.

Because their sect master entered the chaotic region with the supreme treasure, he was attacked by the primal chaos stones.

Not only did he die in there, even the star field was broken into pieces!

The power of the Heavenly Fate Supreme Treasure Star Field was extremely huge, especially in the chaotic region, it had a huge advantage.

Once, the exquisite universe’s saint saint also relied on this heavenly fate supreme treasure to become the Supreme Master of the exquisite universe.

He had also established the most powerful force in the Linglong universe, the Heavenly Saint Realm.

He had used the starfield to enter this chaotic region and obtained a large amount of resources.

In fact, the three of them had been able to break through because of their sect leader.

Unfortunately, they had already searched for tens of billions of years for this starfield fragment, but they were still unable to gather it.

Now, they had actually sensed the existence of the starfield fragment.

How could they not be pleasantly surprised!

“Let’s Go!”

Saint Shan Tian’s gaze focused. Without any hesitation, he held the divination lamp and flew out instantly!

The other three Heaven’s origin creation powerhouses followed closely behind!

Buzz! Buzz

Soon, they stopped in the void and looked at the figure in front of them.

“HMM?”

At this moment, Wang Xian, who was observing the situation in the riot zone, suddenly felt four pairs of eyes staring at him. He revealed a surprised expression.

He looked over and sized up the four figures.

“Great Dao level!”

When Wang Xian landed on the old man who was holding an ancient oil lamp, his gaze froze slightly!

Great Dao level. His aura was weaker than the fallen Shadow Devil Emperor.

It should be an existence who had just stepped into the Great Dao realm!
